Resources for and Comparisons of O&M, SWE and SOS (Versions 1.0 and 2.0)

= Introduction =

The purpose of this document is to detail components of the Sensor Observation Service (SOS)as they are described by various authorities and groups which advocate best practices. Included in this post are resources which detail the components between SWE Common and Observation and Measurement


= Resources =

*The following resources are relevant:*<br><br>
*Observation and Measurement*<br>
O&M 1.0.0 for SOS 1.0.0.(52 north) - https://wiki.52north.org/bin/view/Sensornet/SosDataModeling<br>
Basic O&M 2.0.0 for SOS 2.0.0. - http://www.ogcnetwork.net/sos_2_0/tutorial/om<br>
